titles.title: In The Sweet By And By

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: In the sweet by and by, newline In the sweet by and by, newline I'll have a mansion so bright and fair, newline Won't it be glorious when I get there, newline In the sweet by and by, newline In the sweet by and by, newline When the battle is done, newline And the vict'ry is won, newline In the sweet by and by.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: In the sweet by and by, newline In the sweet by and by, newline I'll stand at last on the street of pure gold, newline Wonders and glory of heav'n behold, newline In the sweet by and by, newline In the sweet by and by, newline Joy will be so complete when my Savior I meet, newline In the sweet by and by.
